name: Bicycle Jump
description:
Bicycle Jump is an exciting puzzle game in which you will spend more than one hour - our application is an original time killer. Bicycle Jump is a great choice for those who like sticky games - test your patience and reaction by driving a bike!

Not sure what to do during the break? Want to pass the time and looking for a nice way? Time killer Bicycle Jump in a hurry to the rescue - the time in the game will fly by quickly and give you a huge amount of positive emotions.

Bicycle Jump will test what your reaction is capable of - control your BMX, conquer difficult levels and come to victory using your dexterity and speed. The application perfectly develops skills for managing your reaction.

Bicycle Jump is perfect for fans of the Jumping genre - our application is steadily gaining momentum, leaving behind the old-fashioned Doodle Jump and its analogs. The further you go, the more jump you will make.

Do you like anti-stress games? Looking for something that can effectively calm your nervous system and relax your brain? Bicycle Jump differs from the usual jumping games in that it does not bother the player and does not annoy him.

For all people who love a bicycle, the game will be just perfect - our application contains a soft colorful background and nice gameplay. Only you and your BMX - test yourself for strength in Bicycle Jump, boldly overcoming difficulties!

In addition, if you cannot live without puzzles and are in search of new games, Bicycle Jump is a great option! Another difference from banal jumpers is a warm-up for the brain. You do not have to commit thousands of monotonous actions - use your thinking to win.

In our application, you will have to apply dexterity and reaction in order to pass level after level - the circle on which you need to avoid fire will move more and more dangerous as you progress through the game. Master new levels, challenging your skills, each time pumping them harder and harder.

And so that you do not get bored - we have added to each level a new visual theme for the ball, which our cyclist bravely conquers over and over again. It is so interesting to know which picture is waiting for you at the next level.
